Determine Utilization Density

KDE_UD_fun.Rd

Determine Utilization Density

Usage

KDE_UD_fun(migration_track, h_par)

Arguments

migration_track

individual-level migration track, with a longitude and latitude column

h_par

smoothing parameter (numeric)

Value

Returns a list with two elements> 1) An object of class `estUD` as produced by `adehabitatHR::kernelUD()`. 2) The track-specific projection (character string)
